trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The Llama counts as one size larger for the purposes of determining its carrying capacity.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The Llama has advantage on saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone} or moved against its will.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} 4 ({@dice 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Laser
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 90/120 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) radiant damage.

action.name: Spit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. {@h}The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against all targets other than the Llama until the beginning of the Llama's next turn.

trait.name: Imposing Presence
entries: The R.O.U.S. uses Strength, in place of Charisma, for {@skill Intimidation|XPHB} checks (included above).

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The R.O.U.S. has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The R.O.U.S. has advantage on attack rolls against hostile targets that are within 5 feet of another conscious creature that is allied with the R.O.U.S.

trait.name: Thick Hide
entries: Whenever the R.O.U.S. takes damage it reduces it by its Constitution modifier (3). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

action.name: Fetid Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} 11 ({@dice 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} until the start of the R.O.U.S.'s next turn.

bonus.name: Scamper
entries: The R.O.U.S. can {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB}.
